steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Navigate to the 'Review' tab in the ribbon.
Click on the 'Track Changes' button to enable change tracking.
Go to the 'View' tab in the ribbon.
Click on the 'Read Aloud' button in the 'Immersive Reader' section.
The text in the document will be read aloud.
To stop the reading, click on the 'Stop' button in the 'Read Aloud' toolbar.
